synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO3)2·6H2O (4.0 mmol, 1.2 g), imidazole and benzimidazole
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered, washed three times with 20 mL DMF
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried at 200 °C under dynamic vacuum (p ≈ 10−4 kPa) for 20 h

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Co(NO3)2·6H2O (4.0 mmol, 1.2 g), imidazole and benzimidazole
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered, washed three times with 20 mL DMF
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried at 200 °C under dynamic vacuum (p ≈ 10−4 kPa) for 20 h

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Zn(NO3)2·6H2O (4.0 mmol, 1.2 g), varying ratios of imidazole and benzimidazole
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered, washed three times with 20 mL DMF
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried at 200 °C under dynamic vacuum (p ≈ 10−4 kPa) for 20 h

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Co(NO3)2·6H2O (4.0 mmol, 1.2 g), varying ratios of imidazole and benzimidazole
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered, washed three times with 20 mL DMF
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried at 200 °C under dynamic vacuum (p ≈ 10−4 kPa) for 20 h

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Co(OAc)2·4H2O (5.0 mmol, 1.245 g) or Zn(OAc)2·2H2O (5.0 mmol, 1.098 g), imidazole (10 mmol, 680 mg)
synthesis_conditions.time: stirred at room temperature overnight, then heated to 140 °C for 24 h
